Date: 2025-06-13 07:54
Subject: Planned Activity Notification: Maintenance for D3 Ivanti Secure VPN Appliance
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

 

Please note that essential maintenance has been scheduled for the D3 Ivanti Secure VPN.

As a result, VPN Service will be unavailable during the change window, post maintenance change Users can resume using VPN services.

  

Maintenance start time: Monday , June 16, 2025, | 07:00 PM GST

Maintenance end time: Monday, June 16, 2025, | 09:00 PM GST

 


We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
